"Welcome to Estalia gentlemen. I will not lie, the chances of your survival are small. Some may even turn against your friends as living corpses, but you have my word that I will use my arcane gifts to ensure your bodies are given unto Morr's Garden. This is the greatest reward, more than even gold, for the fate of your soul is an eternal concern. Now come, follow me. Strike down the undead that rise against us, allow me to find this eldritch amulet. I ask not for my own selfish studies, but for the good of the Empire."

可以和小伙伴愉快的开黑游戏，让你体验鬼面的偷窥，迈叔的死亡凝视，凛妹和护士对你的偏执，皮脸对你的爱等等一系列体验，绝对是一款打发时间，寻找刺激的不二选择。玩了很多游戏，中途弃坑了很多游戏，只有杀机还在坚持玩，对我来说，这款游戏真的很好玩。

200시간 정도 플레이하고 흥미가 떨어져 다른게임 하고있지만 산 값은 톡톡히 했다고 생각합니다.

기본적으로 1:4의 게임이기 때문에 생존자가 할때 스트레스 덜받습니다.

살인자의 경우 중요한 스킬들이 있기 때문에 블러드포인트를 넉넉히 모으고 시작하시는걸 추천합니다.

저는 북미에 와서 게임을 샀기 때문에 북미섭기준으로밖에 말씀을 못드리겠네요. 

살인마 130시간정도 생존자 70시간정도 비율로 했습니다.

북미 밸런스는 생존자에게 매우 유리하게 되어있습니다.

한명을 집요하게 노리는 플레이가 살인마에게 가장 쉬운 올킬각을 가져오지만, 그게 금기시 되거든요.

처음시작하면 20랭크이며 20랭크에서 16랭크까지는 살인마나 생존자나 도찐개찐으로 뭐할지모르고 어버버합니다.

15랭크부터는 매칭이 좀 심각하게 어썸해지는데, 이때부터 4랭크이상 빨간색 랭크들이 종종보입니다.

실력차이는 둘째치고 스킬종류부터 차원이다릅니다. 살인자로하던 생존자로하던 양학입니다.

이런거에 멘탈 갈리시는분은 사는걸 비추천합니다.

15~5랭크까지는 비매너행위를 매애애애애우 자주볼수있습니다. (한명 잡고 죽을때까지 앞에서 쳐다보거나 살인마 만나면 앉았다 일어났다하며 신나게 약올린다거나)

4랭크이상부터는 제법 클린하고 밸런스도 맞게 느껴집니다. 사실분들은 참고.

I think I bought this game during the first month of it's existence and thoroughly enjoyed it for awhile before I just stopped playing. I picked it back up on occasion after a couple years and some DLC but never fully got back into it as I have recently. Over the past couple of months I've spent time leveling every survivor to 50 and all of the killers to 40 fully unlocking every teachable perk in the game. I can definitely say that I love Dead by Daylight and it is my current favorite game to play. I swap between killer and survivor and the only downside is the toxic chat post game. If that is a concern of yours, you can hide the chat after the first match and not have to see it again for the rest of the day. Avoiding that makes that game so much more enjoyable.

the only developers at behavior that play dead by daylight quit. That should tell you enough. Now, what you get are a bunch of objectively bad balance changes that completely throw off the game. New maps are continually unbalanced. instances of bugs that result in instant heals for survivors. Hackers that hold the lobby hostage and force you to quit. The game used to be good, but there's no competitor so behavior has no financial obligation to put effort.

The art department is great. Everything else is bad. They're gonna focus on raytracing when the game is very poorly optimized. The community is more toxic than dota's, and that's impressive.
